com.dtolabs.rundeck.core.plugins

Class LocalFirstClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • com.dtolabs.rundeck.core.plugins.LocalFirstClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LocalFirstClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Loads classes from the local URLs first, before delegating to the parent.
